name: Speed Limit: Stage 2
description:
"Speed Limit: Stage 2" is the second level of our arcade platformer "Speed Limit" which has been redesigned for mobile devices.

The full "Speed Limit" game is a retro style shooter for PCs and arcade cabinets inspired by old-school arcade games. The player runs for his life from well-dressed baddies through many taxing levels which get ever faster as you run, drive sports cars and fly fighter jets to escape your doom! The gameplay changes as you progress through the levels, to keep you on your toes, and keep you guessing what lurks around the corner.

To get up to date information, be sure to follow us on Facebook and Twitter on @gamechuckdev :)

name: The Pit
description: A popular BBS Door game by Midas Touch Software.

name: Fallen Legion: Rise to Glory - Exemplary Edition
description:
"Exemplary Edition Includes:
• Fallen Legion: Rise to Glory for Nintendo Switch
• Official Hardcover Art Book
• Official Soundtrack
• Medallion of Honor
• Collector's Box"

name: Gloom
description: The game of inauspicious incidents and grave consequences. In this award winning card game, make your family as miserable as possible while making your rival's family as happy as you can! Push your family members down the stairs, make them be stabbed or eaten by bears before the grand finale: spoiler alert, everybody dies!

name: War Clash
description: War Clash is the first true mobile real-time strategy game and offers players the chance to unleash the power of unique heroes in head-to-head and 3v3 battles. Lead a variety of fantasy-themed troops into battle, and take advantage of heroes' powers to give yourself a strategic edge. The game features real-time base building, versatile army units, capturable resources, and a vibrant cast of characters.

name: Nodge Pre-Alpha
description:
Nodge is a 3rd person exploration sandbox. Explore this colorful little planet alone or with friends in coop multiplayer. 
Note: Nodge is still in full development, pretty much everything you see is work-in-progress and subject to change.

name: Navalny 20!8 : The Rise of Evil
description: The final battle between the good and the neutral.

name: The Prime MoVR
description: Command armies in strategic VR warfare, cast powers through a 3D gesture system, or control the Construct for close-quarters destruction. Each of the three paths has its own benefits, it's up to you to react to your enemy's tactics to ensure victory.

name: Light Strike Array
description: Light Strike Array is a crystalpunk VR "tactics-brawler" where depth & complexity meet martial-arts physicality. Featuring a one-of-a-kind movement system, a dynamic team-based game mode, and a wide spectrum of highly physical weapons, Light Strike Array shines like nothing else—in any reality.

name: Glass City : The Dust
description: Glass City : The Dust is a distinctive sim game. Control your character, trying to survival in a glasshouse, making profit from planting, crafting, and so on. Competing with AI, and trying to make the population of city grow, keep the people from contacting deadly germs.

name: Battlezone Combat Commander
description: "A mysterious alien force threatens humanity itself. In this galaxy-wide war, you are in command of the resistance. Leading from the front, you take to the battlefield in thrilling first-person combat, piloting futuristic, customisable war machines including hover-tanks, colossal mech walkers, lightning-fast mortar-bikes and more."

name: Age of seas
description: Take charge of a great ship and make the right decisions if you do not want to end up at the bottom of the sea devoured by sharks or other marine".

name: Blessed Surface
description: An open-world 2d platformer, Blessed Surface uses the side-scrolling perspective to create a deep, greatly vertical space with no sky, only endless passages upwards. A functioning ecosystem, equipment customization, timed/random events and more form a rich, living world. With online multiplayer!

name: A song in the void
description: Rescue a dead civilization from its dark fate and ensure its rebirth. Explore various islands and complete complex platform puzzles to discover your place in a world where everything is tied to music. You are the last hope of your people… A Song in the Void.

name: True Mining Simulator
description: True Mining Simulator will teach you to mine. We're not talking copper, iron or coal. We're talking money. Real money, made straight out of electricity. You will like it.

name: Stars End
description: Stars End is a multiplayer sci-fi survival game set hundreds of years in the future in a solar system colonized by humans. Come and join us for crafting, construction, missions and PvP on the wild frontier...

name: Super Mighty Power Man: The Champion of the Galaxy
description:
Super Mighty Power Man is a genuine 2D action-platformer game reminiscent of video games from the late 80’s early 90’s. It is like games found on the NES console when fun was more than QTE, lengthy tutorials, and never-ending cinematics.

Super Mighty Power Man (SMPM) is greatly inspired by the famous Mega Man game series as well as others including: Castlevania, Contra, Duck Tales, Kirby, Super Mario Bros. and more recent ones like VVVVVV, Retro City Rampage and Shovel Knight. Besides being a true love letter to the NES legendary gaming era, it is above all a tribute to the renowned Blue Bomber and our passion for such games that has stayed with us since childhood.

Play as Corey, a gutsy kid who accidentally finds himself caught in a most unexpected adventure to save the galaxy. Helped by a clumsy extraterrestrial robot named Robby, and armed with a mysterious device called ‘The Power Grasp’, Corey must defend the Earth from the spreading evil forces of General Mok. He will need to fight (and jump) his way through deadly environments, hordes of monsters and other hazardous traps to free occupied planets from the tyranny of his enemy’s lieutenants.

‘The Power Grasp’ grants Corey superhuman powers, allowing him to merge with other lifeforms and become one of the many forms of Super Mighty Power Man!

name: Rotate: Professional Virtual Aviation Network
description:
Rotate is an MMO aviation platform for Flight Sim and Air Traffic Control enthusiasts. Bring your favourite Aviation Sim and experience the best possible realism and function from a Virtual Aviation Network. Play as a pilot or air traffic controller and join other players from around the world.
Be part of our Kickstarter campaign and receive exclusive items, experiences and access.

name: Last Defense
description: The last defense is a unique tower defense, with special mechanics.

name: The Key to Home
description: Tens of millions of yen hidden in an Elementary school!? Lies, secrets, and underhanded tactics... Students and teachers struggle against one another.

name: Galactic Pocket Billiards
description: Galactic Pocket Billiards is a relaxing physics based puzzle game where you try to knock celestial objects into black holes.

name: Xagia Wars
description:
Xagia Wars is an epic fantasy tale about Magic, Courage, and Friendship that revolves around Isaac Victor, a young man brimming with talent living his daily wizardry school life. 
But his fate is already determined, as Cahos the resurrected one will bring the end to the world. What kind of fate awaits him?

name: Ergastulum
description: Ergastulum is a first-person fantasy horror adventure game that blends a mix of Asian and Western folklore to create a terrifying vision that will test a players faith to the extremes. The game focuses on psychological horror which relies on the character’s fears and abnormal psyche to frighten players. How far will you go in rediscovering your lost faith?

name: Love Bites
description: Play as male or female in this horror dating sim. A curse was cast upon you, can love be a cure for what ails you?

name: Project Xandata
description: Project Xandata is a skill-based competitive, first-person shooter by veteran Filipino developers, Secret 6. Engage in your chosen play style with an expansive customization system in a world that blends sci-fi, fantasy, and Philippine mythology.

name: Primordial Darkness
description: Kek, the god of Primordial Darkness, is displeased with you. He's sentanced you to a life of having to relive your death, over, and over.

name: Oppaidius Summer Trouble!
description:
An ecchi visual novel with a '90s retro vibe!
It features original FM-synth music (Yamaha YM2151 sound chip), pixel art (PC-98) backgrounds, and yes, oppai!

name: Dark Town : Invisible Danger
description: Real story which happened at a village in Muğla, Turkey at 1986. Some villagers made deals with the devil for find treasure. After that day, nothing happened like old times. You want this treasure because your character is greedy. Can you success it for real ?

name: Evasion
description: Evasion is an intense VR shooter game, designed to immerse players in high intensity co-op multiplayer combat. Experience the next generation in VR locomotion designed for authentic FPS action. Choose a class and then join up to three friends or go on alone in an extinction-level battle for survival.

name: Shineg in the SeaFight
description:
In the endless sea, our Shine begins his journey again.
The process of the game is simple, exploring more seas, eliminating more monsters, and constantly strengthening their warships

name: Re Angel
description: Re Angel is a 2nd visual novel created by Studio GU, an indy game developer from Thailand.

name: Wild Light
description: Wild Light is an unforgiving roguelike RPG set on a procedurally generated island. Explore, hunt, and craft in the daylight. Survive the chaotic darkness where each night increasingly more brutal enemies arrive on the island, hunting for you.

name: Battle For Korsun
description: January 1944. The German Army had their last toehold on the Dneiper River. The Soviet player must coordinate the offensives of his Fronts to encircle the Germans quickly, before the Germans powerful reinforcements arrive.

name: Differently Fast
description: Differently Fast is a competitive Chariot Racing Club in VR. Horseless. It’s blood, sweat and glory.

name: Hero's Descent
description: Battle against time in this faced-paced retro-inspired Rogue-like

name: Interworlds
description: Worlds are inter-connected. If you do something to the mini-world, a bigger "you" in a bigger world will do the same thing to your world. With this magic, you will solve puzzles and fight with enemies throughout the adventure.

name: Otome Yusha
description: Sin descripción

name: Entaku no Seito 2
description:
A sequel to Entaku no Seito, a PC game that wasn't released outside of Japan.

It was announced as tactical RPG inspired by Shining Force and Fire Emblem being developed for Xbox One during a livestream in 2015 but not much else is known it.

name: The Floor Is Made of Lava
description: Discover many different worlds as Jimmy searches for his brother, in this game that's somewhere between Mario and Megaman.

name: ThunderWheels
description: ThunderWheels is a retro racing game with a classic top-down perspective plus third and first person view, realistic physics and really fun circuits full of 80's nostalgia.

name: The Little Prince VR
description: "It is only with the heart that one can see truly".The Little Prince VR is an interactive adventure that follows the events of Antoine de Saint-Exupery's masterpiece.

name: Fate Crawler
description: Fate Crawler is a dynamic and colorful adventure featuring both classical and new Rogue-like elements. Choose your hero and lead his fate by changing various events into your favor. Combine unique abilities and artifacts to form individual play style for each run.

name: The Zero Dome
description: Float, build and shoot in VR in the zero gravity arena known as "The Zero Dome" . Mixing elements of arcade and survival games, The Zero Dome is a sandbox arcade game like no other, built from the ground up for VR.

name: Lemons Must Die
description: Get John Lemon through strange worlds and save Liz Lemon from the monstrous creatures who have taken her!

name: Ever, Jane
description: Ever, Jane is an on-line role-playing game set in the virtual world of Regency England and the works of Jane Austen. Unlike many multi-player games, it's not about kill or be killed but invite or be invited. Gossip is our weapon of choice. Instead of raids, we will have grand balls. Instead of dungeons, we will have dinner parties.

name: Capsa
description: Capsa is an open world, social game which provides users with the opportunity to hang out in an absolutely breathtaking, and ever expanding environment.

name: ShineG Has Nightmares
description:
Shine was caught in an endless nightmare 
All the terrible dreams that people dream about are pouring in to Shine. 
What should Shine do?

name: Anonymous ME
description: Anonymous Me is a 2D action platformer set in Qin Dynasty of China. Female assassin Meng Nv calls it quits after the organization she is in falls apart. Somehow she is plunged into a huge conspiracy. Players take the role of “Mang” and travels across China in Qin Dynasty and eliminate different enemies using cool combos, ultimately unraveling the mystery of this prosperous empire.

name: Fantasization
description: Fantasization is a team-based roleplaying game with turn-based tactical combat, deep RPG mechanics and an evolving procedurally generated world with multiple factions.

name: Clicker Heroes 2
description: A never-ending idle incremental RPG. Choose your favorite hero and embark on a glorious journey to the top right of your screen.

name: Fantasy Earth Genesis
description: Sin descripción

name: Duck n' Dodge
description:
Duck n' Dodge is a platforming title inspired by classic Atari games and modern endless runners. Race to the end while avoiding bullets, blades, and colorful enemies.

Features:

-Challenging yet forgiving platforming gameplay
-Proceedural Level Generation. Never play exactly the same way twice!
-Original In-Game Soundtrack
-A robust level editor, allowing users to design and play their own levels
-Multiple playable gamemodes

Duck n' Dodge is currently in a state of closed Alpha, and is planned for release as a Steam Early Access title in early 2018.

name: Prime Arena
description: Prime Arena is a combination of MOBA and survival gameplay inspired by PUBG. This dynamic deathmatch arena is free of forced socialization and thus of toxic atmosphere found in MOBAs. Victory fully depends on player’s skill and reaction speed — no teammates, no cry!

name: Jamie's Dream
description: Jamie's Dream is a short, emotional, experimental, psychological horror narrative experience. Walk through nightmares, facing fears and memories as they are revealed going deeper and deeper into the abyss of Jamie's mind.

name: Fruit for the Village
description: Build a thriving garden to feed a starving village in this VR production game about hope, peace, and fruit.

name: Taphouse VR
description: In Taphouse VR, you are the bartender! Run your own taphouse, give drunk dwarves their fill of delicious ale or drench the bunch by mixing delicious cocktails! Everything around the counter is yours to mess with - including your paying customers.

name: Cthulhu Clicker
description: Cthulhu Clicker is a "clicker" where players raise monsters to make them bigger and stronger.

name: Happy Manager
description: Happy Manager is a love adventure game with support for PlayStation VR, where players work as a manager of a mansion with three tenants.

name: Almost Hero
description: Brawl with cartoon super-villains, engage in a bonsai seed economy, and unlock the power of Foot Passion as you become the greatest ninja your city has ever known. Save your master as you become the almost hero Omosai deserves.

name: I_AM.exe
description:
I_AM.exe is a first person action game with a focus on exploration. 
You wake up inside a vat on a strange place full of robots trying to kill you. Explore, solve puzzles and fight your way through different areas as you try to find a way out and understand what is going on and just who are you.

name: ASCII Wars
description: Protect the servers. Locate the vulnerabilities. Exterminate the viruses. This fast paced strategy game lets you enter terminal commands from a VR interface to defeat the viruses before you become overrun.

name: Initiative: Red Dawn
description: Initiative: Red Dawn is an Aerospace Company Manager. Build and grow your aerospace company on Earth and be the first to establish a self-sustainable colony on Mars.

name: Gorebreaker
description: Gorebreaker is the follow-up to Death Cargo.

name: Skirmish Line
description: Experience the brutality and randomness of war as an Allied tactical commander in the Pacific Theater during World War 2. Train, equip, and command a squad of soldiers as you fight against the fanatical Imperial Japanese Empire.

name: Alchemage
description: You accidently stepped into a mysterious land and started an epic adventure only to return home. You build shelters, explore biomes, fight with monsters, and discover ancient ruins to uncover the myth of the world.

name: CometStriker
description: CometStriker is an arcade action shooter featuring dodging, strategic power-ups and intense boss fights.

name: Tick Tick Pass
description: The ultimate trivia game, Tick Tick Pass is a list-filling game suitable for single players or parties alike, with hundreds of hours of content!

name: Black Death: Divarication
description: Black Death: Divarication is 2d metroidvania with a storyline and RPG elements that will put you in a whole new and a detailed science fiction universe of alternative future. In the game you will have to act as an officer of the Mortus's order who has to keep a watch in one of the colonized worlds.

name: Goodnight
description: These events happened in the places where any crime is nonsense. In broad daylight at the same time three children disappeared in nowhere. A young detective Jim Rene is the closest to the key of a mystery. But what’s the price of it? It's time to strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield.

name: Pro Gamer Manager 2
description: Pro Gamer Manager 2 is an e-sport simulator game. Create, manage and compete with your own team of Pro Gamers. Conquer all obstacles and become the number one team in the world!

name: Witch Hunt
description: Witch Hunt is a horror themed hunting game that takes place in the 18th century. Main focus of the game is on exploration, non-linearity, and atmosphere.

name: Antaria Online
description: Antaria Online is a Cross-Platform MMORPG being developed with community feedback.

name: Celestian Tales: Realms Beyond
description: An RPG with turn-based combat and a story of questionable morals seen through multiple perspectives.

name: Hunt For Gods
description:
The First Strategic Online Battle (Royale) Arena that supports Virtual Reality with 2 totally different roles in the same team. 
3 teams, 3 Gods, 12 players, one rule: Win.

name: The Devil's Eight
description: "The Devil's Eight is a fast paced boss rush where you must fight your way through the circles of hell. The Eight Overseers sealed away your powers, leaving you with only a shield to defend yourself. With your offensive options gone, you must master your opponent's movements, expose their weaknesses, and use your divine shield to reflect their strongest attacks back upon them. Fight your way through the eight electronic soundscapes that fuel the overseers of the inferno. Each world is driven by their own unique soundtrack, inspiring a fresh boss experience in this abstract psychedelic hell."

name: White Day 2: Swan Song
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Galaxy Boy
description: Let go of Gravity in this indie platformer adventure! Search from one star system to the next and blast beyond your enemies with your multi-functional raygun to save your friends!

name: Making History: The Second World War
description: Choose a nation and prepare for the greatest conflict in human history, World War II. Build your military and industrial power, form alliances and race to achieve the advanced technologies that will bring total victory in this global-wide turn-based Grand Strategy struggle.

name: Lost Lands Collection
description: Lost Lands is an adventurous hidden object game-quest with puzzles and mini-games that tells a fairy-tale story about the world with never-before-seen races and folk types.

name: Logistical: The Lot
description: Logistical: The Lot gives you access to all the modules created for LOGistICAL, including the base game.

name: Logistical: North America
description:
Logistical spans across North America. This bundle contains:

- Logistical
- Logistical: Canada
- Logistical: USA - Hawaii
- Logistical: USA - California
- Logistical: USA - Florida
- Logistical: USA - Oregon
- Logistical: USA - New York
- Logistical: USA - Wisconsin
- Logistical: Caribbean
- Logistical 2: USA - Nevada

name: Logistical: Europe
description:
Logistical spans across Europe. This Bundle Contains:

- Logistical
- Logistical: The Netherlands
- Logistical: Germany
- Logistical: British Isles
- Logistical: Italy
- Logistical: Norway
- Logistical: Russia
- Logistical: Switzerland
- Logistical 2: Belgium
- Logistical 2: France

name: Game Tengoku: Cruisin Mix
description: A complete port of the 1997 Sega Saturn game "Game Tengoku" or "The Game Paradise", to PlayStation 4 and PC through Steam.

name: The Essence Reaper Ritual
description: The Essence Reaper Ritual is a classical epic fantasy RPG videogame where you lead a party of up to 5 adventurers. Your decisions will shape the world of Eternalia and the party members willing to join you.

name: A Rip In Time
description: Time travel in a new twisted way. The game’s antagonist will be pulling you through “Rips in Time”. The further you explore, the more intertwined the worlds become! Experience the early 1900’s and future all in one, thanks to the power of Unreal Engine 4.

name: Outburst
description: Welcome to the world of Outburst! Discover numerous heroes, each with unique abilities, and play one of action-packed game modes. Gain experience and earn new skills to overcome your enemies. Whether you want a quick deathmatch or competitive arena - invite your friends to get new allies - or enemies!

name: Microgammon SB
description:
Microgammon SB originally started out as an Apple IIe game. According to programmer Steve Baker, he had originally developed the game for the Apple when he decided to port it to the Atari 5200. Since the 5200 possessed a high resolution mode that was on par with the Apple's, the conversion was pretty straightforward. However one side effect of using the 5200's high-res mode was that the graphics were in black & white only. However most players find that this really doesn't distract much from the game since it uses black and white pieces anyway.

It was meant to be released in September 15th, 1983. It was later included in Atari compilations.

name: Xari Arena
description:
A previously unreleased prototype game for the Atari 5200.

Your goal is to destroy all the Xari's that come out of the well in the center of the screen before they can destroy all your blocks. You can use the joystick or the trackball controller.

Each player resembles a hollow paddle (like a capsule), which you can move around your side of the screen. Your paddle can catch and hold up to three fireballs (the little star looking things that the Xari's shoot), and each stored fireball allows you to destroy one Xari by running into it. If you hit a Xari without any fireballs stored in your paddle, it is temporarily stunned and you cannot catch or deflect any shots for a few seconds. If you already have three fireballs stored up, your paddle will start reflecting the fireballs back at the Xari's (a great tactic for those hard to reach guys that won't come near you) and at your partner (which is not so good). You can choose to reflect shots even if you don't have three fireballs stored up by pressing the bottom controller button.

If things start to get out of control you can activate your fire extinguisher (using the top controller button) to temporarily protect your blocks. The fire extinguisher coats your blocks with foam and will destroy any shots that touch it. the foam moves quickly down your blocks and only lasts for a few seconds so you have to use it wisely (like when fireballs get behind your blocks). You get one new fire extinguisher each level, which can be stored for later use.

It was meant to be released in October 20th, 1983. It was later released digitally in Atari compilations.

name: Squids From Space
description: Squids From Space is a team-based PvP top-down shooter where humans and the sinister Squid aliens wage war for the future of the Earth!

name: Fading of Zarya 7
description:
About the Game 
Rare chemical materials have been found on a newly discovered planet – Tesaur, far into space. He who controls these resources will make a great leap in energy and economic areas for humanity.

name: Jaws of Extinction
description: The island of Eden-Nadir, has fallen to a vicious mind-consuming fungal parasite. Fight through the ashes of humanity to track down the truth behind the infection as one of four playable survivors before the outbreak spreads throughout the world.

name: A Cat's Manor
description: With no memory and a hand attached to its tail, the cat doesn't realize what's in store for it.

name: Shank n' Bake
description: Shank n' Bake is an exciting, twisted take on runner games. Set off to end the human's healthy food movement by slaying your foes and baking their corpses into junk food minions!

name: Mama Russia Needs You
description: Mama Russia Needs You is a bloody shoot'em up set in the alternative history, where USSR is at the final stage of taking over the world.

name: Enlightenment
description: In Enlightenment, you play in a roguelike action-shooter with a fast-paced challenging journey deep into a underground complex called "the Ark". Players will be tested by large varieties of enemies in a procedurally-generated dungeon, and become stronger by learning from the inevitable deaths.

name: Exzore: The Rising
description: Sin descripción

name: Special Forces VR
description: ‘​SPECIAL FORCES VR​’ a multiplayer tactical VR shooter. The game delivers an immersive gameplay which overcomes the weaknesses of many similar titles. With High-end graphics and dynamic movement system: the game brings a breath of fresh air into the classic military-vs-terrorists genre.

name: Space Dream
description: Space Dream VR is a Virtual Reality Experience filled with Stunning Beauty; combining elements of Music Visualization, Storytelling & Gameplay.

name: Longsword Tabletop Tactics
description: Longsword brings turn-based tabletop tactics to the digital world of PC Gaming. In Longsword, you will collect and build an army comprised of miniature champions, spells, equipment, and structures. You can then customize the appearance of your army and enter it into battle on a hex-based tabletop battlefield!

name: Terra Wars
description: Another game set in the Terra World universe.

name: Swordfight
description: This game was finished at MNetwork in the 1980's, but not released until much later. In 2000, Intellivision Productions released this game complete with a simple box and manual. It is still available from their web site. Swordfight requires two players, which is possibly why the game was not released in the first place.

name: Holey Moley
description:
Holey Moley was an unreleased prototype written by Bob Polaro. The game was originally programmed back in 1983, but was never commercially released due to ownership changes at Atari. This game requires the use of the Kid's Controller, although the keyboard and touch pad controllers work fine with it also.
A version of Holey Moley complete with a cartridge, manual, box and Kid's Controller overlay was sold at the 2002 Classic Gaming Expo. You can purchase a copy of Holey Moley by visiting Atari2600.com.

name: Freemium Way
description: Freemium Way is an adventure game with tactical turn-based battles and sandbox elements. Find all pieces of the puzzle to identify why does Freemium come to the world of modern games and try to curb it.

name: WindSoul
description: WindSoul is a project of recreation and reinvention Sea-Battle game experience. It consists of two versions of the game, each one represents a different gaming experience: Classic and Remastered. Inside of it there are all-new game modes and "Global Campaign Mode"...

name: Serment - Contract with a Devil
description: Serment - Contract with a Devil is a visual novel/dungeon crawler hybrid featuring highly tactical turn based RPG battles, challenging dungeon puzzles, optional minigames and most importantly, a lot of cute anime girls.

name: Anthology
description:
Anthology is a collection of short adventure games by Lewis Denby (that's me!), the co-creator of Owl Cave's critically acclaimed Richard & Alice and the producer of Sepulchre (The Charnel House Trilogy). 
 
Set in a faraway city on a single afternoon, a series of point-and-click vignettes unravels the story of this strangely familiar world, its sprawling capital, and the lives of those who dwell within it.

name: Project Taurus
description: Project Taurus is an arcade racing game built for a fun-first multiplayer experience with highly addictive gameplay. A variety of games modes, from a standard race to a demolition derby, will provide constant entertainment in multiplayer, with a singleplayer option to play offline or abuse AI to enhance the experience.

name: Eshigami no Kizuna
description: Artists borrow the power of ‘god’ and battle their ‘deadlines’!

name: Space Junkies
description: A visceral, jetpack-fueled VR Arcade Shooter where you fly through deadly Orbital Arenas in HOSTILE SPACE, facing off in extreme battles!

name: Raise the Dead
description: Raise The Dead is a zombie experimentation game. Perform research and experiments on zombies. Craft potions. Grow various plants and upgrade your equipment. Your ultimate goal is to find a cure to the zombie outbreak.

name: Concrete Sky
description: Concrete Sky - is an adventure set in a post-war USSR. Global nuclear conflict ended a few years ago, making surface of the Earth uninhabitable. Few survivors are struggling for their lives under the ground, making occasional forays to the surface.

name: Our End of the World
description: Filled with puzzles, the story between she and me at the end of the world.

name: Aeon's Dawn
description: A turn-based tactical RPG, focusing on large scale combat. Branching story with multiple endings.

name: The Feud: Wild West Tactics
description: Feud: Wild West Tactics is a turn based game all about gun blazing, shotgun blasting, knife stabbing and dynamite throwing action in the Wild West. Follow the story or set out on your own to build a western empire. Do you have the grit to showdown against the toughest gunslingers?

name: Star Sonata 2
description: Star Sonata 2 is a space-themed massively multiplayer online game that combines elements of action, RPG, and empire creation into a truly unique MMO experience. Explore the sandbox style universe, build persistent bases, construct trade ships, and even fight your way to the top and claim the Emperor’s Throne!

name: Unraveled: Tale of the Shipbreaker's Daughter
description: A dialogue-free adventure RPG, driven by the story of a little girl whose family has gone missing at a ship breaking yard. Music by Secret of Mana's Hiroki Kikuta. Adventure through a child’s innocent and magical imagination as it meets the dark reality of life.

name: Sector Zero
description: Sector Zero is a story-driven sci-fi survival game with light RPG elements. Software engineer Alex wakes up with no memory in an unfamiliar and hostile environment.  Without a weapon he'll have to use his fast reaction and brains to fight the threats that await for him behind every corner.

name: Endless Dead
description: Endless Dead is a 3D arcade isometric shooter. Half RPG, Half machine gun fueled Gauntlet clone that focuses on looting, action, and zombie carnage.   Traverse miles over urban and rural locations and uncover the source of the zombie virus.

name: Omni
description: Set in total darkness, Omni is a game about solving puzzles by shooting around orbs of light. It will challenge players to explore and memorize their paths while bringing forth the traditional first person puzzle action game.

name: Warhawks
description: Fly in some of the most notable air battles of WWII in powerhouses of the sky. This fully 3D VR experience puts you behind the stick of a P51 mustang air fighter to defend and destroy key targets in the allies' fight against the axis powers.

name: Life of Rome
description:
Life of Rome is a third and first-person MMORPG set in the world of 320AD Rome. Choose to be Roman allegiance or Rebels; designed to emphasise roleplay and community using family systems and player-driven politics. 

Fortes Fortuna Iuvat - Fortune Favours the Bold

name: Sparkour
description: Sparkour is a 4-Player First-Person Racing game, where you and your friends use speed, agility, and strategy to boost yourself across the finish line!

name: Crystal Flux
description: Crystal Flux is a rhythm snowboarding shooter that rewards player for picking up orbs in sync with the music. The 12 track original score was written alongside development to blend art style and drive gameplay.

name: Fruit Golf
description: Fruit Golf is the wacky mini golf game where you hit a wide variety of succulent fruit into absurd situations. Play with up to four people in the same room using your smartphones or tablets.

name: Indef
description: You get the motorcycle and now you're trying to outrun the death. Riding the ruined world, you should choose: save or be saved, live or survive, kill or be killed. Press the gas and find a way to survive.

name: Wormhole City
description: Wormhole City is a single-player sci-fi adventure game where you must interact with characters, machines, and the environment to achieve your objectives and progress throughout the game.Control Space Force mercenary Acero Astra as you escort a spaceship convoy to safety in the frontier sectors of space.

name: The Wake
description: Immerse. Adapt. Survive. Engage in hand-to-hand combat using the HTC Vive, a huge assortment of weapons, and your will to survive! You must use every resource at your disposal, from bare fists to an array of bats, axes, bladed weapons, explosives, guns, and even a 2-handed chainsaw.

name: Quest of Souls
description: Quest of Souls is a twin-stick fantasy shoot 'em up RPG inspired by the 90's era of SNES games, about a corgi dragonslayer, a goodly lich, a lizardman samurai, and their quest to track down a powerful magical artifact that was stolen by a mysterious dark sorcerer.

name: Irrational Exuberance
description: Journey to imaginary worlds as a lone explorer in deep space. Designed for the HTC Vive, Irrational Exuberance transports you to beautiful, mysterious, and incredible worlds. As you change stunning, surreal landscapes, will you discover the secrets binding the universe together?

name: Hastilude
description: Hastilude is a competitive and co-op action game for 1 to 4 players. Climb atop your mount and soar into battle using your wits, reflexes, and an array of weapons and special abilities against your opponents. Dismount your foes and swoop in for the score!

name: Draco Dux
description:
Drax has been captured by an evil wizard and only you can aid him in returning home! 
Plan your approach, collect magic powers, solve puzzles and battle monsters! Control your Dragons by pointing & clicking! 
Help Draco by leading his way through a magical fantasy world full of dangers!

name: Disobey - Revolt Simulator
description: "When injustice becomes law, rebellion becomes duty" - Are you ready to lead a Revolt? Disobey is a hybrid game between a real time strategy and a third person action game.

name: Glory Warrior: Lord of Darkness
description: After centuries of peace, the world has been thrown into darkness and chaos. The dead have risen to reclaim the realm for themselves. The Lord of Darkness plans to destroy your kingdom and cast the world into an infernal apocalypse

name: Shadow Over Isolation
description:
“If you’re reading this, chances are it’s too late” 
Shadow Over Isolation is a First-Person Adventure Horror game INSPIRED by the storytelling style of H.P. Lovecraft and Visual Acuity & Artist Style of Stanley Kubrick. All without the stereotypical Haunted House gameplay saturating the adventure gaming market.

name: Voodoo
description: Voodoo is a multiplayer open-world survival game set amidst the fantasy wildlife of primal Africa. Champion the call of your tribe by hunting, gathering and crafting resources, building your village, and battling for territory and domination at the dawn of civilization.

name: Fantasy Bump
description: Fantasy Bump is a parkour party platformer for 1-6 players that mashes single-screen battle shenanigans with super JRPG feels. Choose your job class, out-jump your opponents and bump your way to victory!

name: Lord of Dwarves
description: Gather resources, craft weapons, and build a castle. Then defend your castle against monsters who will try to siege, sap, and smash their way in. All in a procedurally generated 3D block world that allows for extensive crafting and total construction and destruction of the terrain.

name: Veterans Online
description: Praise the Veterans, a fresh Free to Play Top-down Shooter, for those who enjoy simple, yet tactical multiplayer battles.

name: Asteroid Fight
description:
ASTEROID FIGHT is an online multiplayer action real-time strategy game. 
 
Use your commander with uniquely modified special abilities, build a strong economy to be able to quickly grow a strong military so you can stand a chance against your enemies and destroy their warp gate. Good team play, fast thinking, and rapid reactions will make the key difference in this fast paced strategy game.

name: HOVR
description: Feel the exhilarating adrenaline of virtual reality in this multiplayer & competitive car combat game. Get on your hoverbike and team up with a friend to battle your enemies through a hardcore and challenging gameplay in amazing cyberpunk arenas.

name: Third Eye
description: Third Eye is a hack 'n' slash adventure based on Indian culture featuring rich 3D graphics, an immersive storyline, challenging level design and hordes of enemies to slay.

name: Blue Screen Adventures
description: BSA is a text adventure game. You will play the nephew or niece of one of the three greatest genius of computer developement from the years 1970/1980.

name: Launch Squad
description: Launch Squad is a multiplayer combat game for VR. Armed with a goo slingshot, you will fight for supremacy in the Launch Squad battle arena!

name: The Amazing Eternals
description:
A game developed by a team at Digital Extremes.

It was described as a competitive FPS with deck-building elements.

Unfortunately, the game didn't attract players fast enough to support a viable matchmaking player base.

name: VR Retreat
description: VR Retreat is a place to meditate, chill and play relaxing games in virtual reality. Enjoy different game modes, music and environments and play at your own pace.

name: Panoptic
description:
Panoptic is an asymmetrical local multiplayer VR game, between an HTC Vive player and a regular PC player.
The Vive player controls the powerful Overseer, while the PC player controls the Challenger, a tiny citizen rebelling against the Overseer's oppressive reign.

name: Bartigo
description:
Bartigo is a Online-Party-Game in which you can visit different bars with up to 9 friends. 
Play countless games, experience witty activities or enjoy the evening with unique entertainment options.

name: Don't Die: Survival
description:
Which one do you wanna be. If you wanna stay alive then kill your enemies!
Explore the true survival world and take part in the development of the full game.

name: Debrysis - an Awesome Badtrip
description:
Hardcore arena shooter on battle vehicles in psychedelic ultra violent realms. 
For perfect experiences.

name: Little Diggel
description: Little Diggel – is a platformer with role-playing system elements, in which you need to solve various puzzles placed on different levels.

name: Hack the FBI
description: Deception is an art, and you've been given your brush.

name: The Rain Spirit : Code Breaker
description:
A First Person , Atmospheric Puzzle Exploratory Game. 
Uncover a huge interactive world filled with codes , clues and puzzles to unlock in different areas . Discover characters and story with an original score.

name: Strikers
description: STRIKERS is a fun and exciting game that mixes MOBA controls and the Soccer playbook using characters with powerful abilities.

name: Operation Biotech
description:
In the distant future tecnologies and organisms become compatible with each other. 
Humanity is under the revolution - digital immortality. World leaders are developing 
the program of tranformation into the cyborgs for everyone

name: Range Day VR
description: Too lazy to go to the range? Is your gun in the repair shop? Never fear Range Day VR is here. If you like playing with realistic guns in an open VR sandbox, then this might be the game for you. Range Day VR is designed to give players a taste of what an actual gun range is like while letting players explore iconic realistic firearms without danger of shooting the family cat. Compete against other players in challenging timed events. Or simply enjoy blowing things up with your favorite .50 cal machine gun.

name: Sinistry Silinium
description: Sinistry Silinium - is a psychological thriller packed together with action, stealth, and puzzle elements. Emphasizing a creepy grasping atmosphere, a perfection of artistic imagery makes up this game. No less time and attention are dedicated to the development of its narrative, combat system, and realistic in-game physics.

name: Pizza Connection 3
description:
Mamma mia... Long awaited by fans around the world, the newest instalment of the cult series "Pizza Connection" returns to the PC with even more flavour and extra cheese.
Make 'em a pizza they can't refuse!

name: See Light
description: See Light -  is a first-person story driven horror game. The main character – talented submarine engineer, who with a team of researchers will searching for the World War II sunken submarine, but the depths of the Black Sea keep all kind of secrets, and the expedition can turn into a disaster at any time.

name: King of the World
description: King of the World is the gameplay from RISK in a Real-time strategy setting. Fight up to 12 players against each other while scheming, backstabbing, making shallow alliances or simply conquer to become the last man standing.

name: District Steel
description: District Steel is a VR action game, bringing back the good old days of gaming. Equipped with a biomechanical arm that gives special time-bending powers and a selection of deadly weapons, there's a bunch of ass-kicking to be done.

name: Disturbed 2
description: Your adventure begins as you take on the role of Gabriel, a young man who lives with his mother in Aramor. From what begins as a normal day, you quickly learn that there is nothing normal about it. With a world filled with mystery and conflict, where will your heart take you?

name: Fleet Wars
description: Fleet Wars is a persistent turn based strategy game where the goal is dominate other empires in order to be the first to construct the Orion project.

name: Laser Drift: OverDrive
description:
Laser Drift: OverDrive  
  
COMING TO PC – LATE 2017!  
  
A retro style top down battle car game for up to 4 players.   
  
Make your friends your enemies with a host of different race tracks, battle arenas, weapons, powerups and game modes. Pure local multiplayer arcade fun!   
  
RACE, BATTLE, SURVIVE, DESTROY!  
  
Sign up to the mailing list on our website for a chance to win a free copy of the game on release! (Don't worry - We won't spam you!)  
  
  
CLASSIC LOCAL MULTIPLAYER!  
  
Up to 4 player players can battle it out in either Battle or Race Modes.  
  
Pick up and play!  
  
  
BATTLE!  
  
Get yourself armed up and destroy the opposition!  
  
A variety of different weapons each with their own strengths and weaknesses - Master them all!  
Gain the upper hand with a well timed power up!  
Free for all or Team vs Team play  
Choose your mode! - We already have Deathmatch, Survivor (Last Man Standing) and Fugitive (Capture the Flag), but we plan to add many more.  
Huge selection of fully authored battle arenas. We have around 20 currently but we're hoping for that to be closer to 50 by the time the game is released!  
  
  
RACE!  
  
Top down racing in the classic mould!  
  
One screen, one track - Entire track visible on the screen at the same time like the old school top down racers of old.  
Huge variety of fully authored tracks - We currently have around 50 but we're hoping for double that by the time we come to release!  
Comprehensive customisable Grand Prix modes.  
Exciting tracks - Not just your run of the mill circuits here. Over and Under, Speed Boosts, Moving Hazards, Shortcuts - It's all in scope!  
Battle or Pure Racing Modes - Choose to introduce weapons and powerups into the mix or to race pure and leave it all down to the driving!  
  
COMING TO PC – LATE 2017!

name: Lazarus
description: Lazarus is a Free to Play top-down action sci-fi mmo for thousands of players in a shared & persistent open world.

name: PiN
description: PiN is a horror-themed action platformer game featuring tight controls, fluid animations, and many, many deaths. All at a glorious 60fps! Coming to Xbox One, iOS, and Android.

name: Endeavour Survival
description:
Endeavour is a First Person Survival Game where you can find food, kills animals, build your own house, and a lot of amazing things. 
 
FULL VERSION INCLUDES: 
 
    2 worlds 
    Full inventory 
    Complete build system 
    Technical Support 24/7 
    T-Shirt of Endeavour 
    Background 
    Multiplayer version (available on future updates)

name: Nanospace
description:
Level  
The game is a 3D platformer with elements of strategy in real time. Each level of the game is a closed location with riddles, "monsters", bonuses and inventory, which is used to finish the levels. The player's goal - to bring party members alive.  
Instead of a single character in the game, you use three characters, each of which has a unique set of abilities.  
  
Characters  
Player control's three characters at once, at any time, by switching between micro-aliens and using the features of each to solve the current problems. Characters have the index of endurance and they need food. You need to monitor and maintain an optimal values.  
  
-Tracker - Flying nano-mite, the most fast moving. Search and Research. Warning of the danger. Take a sample for the presence of the necessary elements, sets a marker if any are found.  
-Harvester - Production of mineral and organic substances as well as the movement of the extracted minerals. Harvester sees the mark left by the Tracker, digs in these places, extracts the loot and moves to the Core. The Core is used as a vendor, stock material collected in the course of the game), the group need to carry a Core and monitor it's safety .  
-Sentinel - Hunting and protecting group. The synthesis of combat and warfare agent.  
  
Game process  
Segregation of duties requires a player to think over the tactics, because nano-mites, despite the unique abilities, represent a real force only if they work together. It's only possible to finish any level with a combination of abilities of each of the nano-mite.  
Thus, the gameplay NANOSPACE is a balanced combination of arcade and 3D platform adventure game, requiring not only the reaction speed, but also the ability to think logically.  
"Custom" gravity controller allows characters to crawl on the steep walls and climb plants, it will expand the tactical abilities of the Player

name: Sunu Ikkibu: Din Nahu
description:
Travels alongside Serena to Martin Garcia Island, to discover what happened to his disappeared inhabitants, including her mother. Discover the mystery surrounding the island by translating texts in Sumerian scattered throughout the place. Solve difficult Puzzles and fight puzzles with "They".

Experience horror in the purest Survival Horror Classic style. The scenarios are based on the real island, completely 3D. And enjoy the 1st / 3rd person mode, where there will be times when the game's camera is changed for greater immersion.

name: The Sacred Hero
description:
A project in early development teased for PC and Nintendo Switch. 
The name isn't final and the sword in the teaser is a placeholder.

name: Audio Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Pilot
description:
How long can you survive? Face intergalactic traffic and space pirates!

Hey guys, this is my new arcade game Space Pilot! It's actually one of my old test games from back in 2013. I've decided to finish it, and since it's actually already playable, I thought why not share it to you guys so that I'll be able to get some feedback while I develop it! I hope you guys enjoy playing my game. Any and all feedback is very welcome!

Controls:

Left Arrow Key - Move Left
Right Arrow Key - Move Right

name: Night Lights
description: Things are different at night. Familiar objects behave strangely.

name: SiviCity
description:
"SiviCity is intended to be an interactive community based within a City, known as Sivi. Those who inhabit the city are called Sivillians.

SiviCity’s target is to become a simulator/role play of sorts, a system where Sivillians can set up businesses and attempt to become the best in their trade, whether it be selling furniture, designing rooms, having your own private security group, having a café or restaurant, and more.

Sivillians will be given a multitude of business opportunities to suit their individual needs. This will be SiviCity’s primary function, alongside the ability to chat with other sivillians, build private apartments, and indulge in mini-games and other interactive games within the City.

SiviCity is still very much in an early testing stage, so we appreciate all the feedback we can get, and we appreciate you spending time in helping us further develop our game."

name: Outreach
description: Outreach is a Cold War conspiracy thriller that employs an authentic zero gravity movement system. Uncover the secrets of a covert military space station in a gripping narrative told from the Soviet perspective.

name: Axis Descending
description: Axis Descending is a Metroidvania Souls-like where you dodge, slash and shock your way through an expansive platforming world, encounter individually unique NPCs, traverse environments without a map and upgrade your character via horizontal progression.

name: Memory of a Broken Dimension
description: You dredge the satellite transmission. Awash in static, harsh structures emerge. Trace a guide line through crushing atmosphere; phantom signals lead to encoded relics. Exhumed from a frozen void, fragmented ruins assemble. But when the stream thaws, no system can handle this overflow...

name: CEO Test
description: CEO Test is a nonlinear, story-driven game about corporate control. The Glazial Group is looking for a new CEO. We are currently developing the CEO Test to preselect potential candidates. This CEO Test will be released as a game, combining nonlinear storytelling with strategy-building elements to test potential applicants' abilities to deal with economic complexity and emotional challenges. Apply for the position of CEO by playing the game once it is released.

name: Trumpet
description: Trumpet is a dark visual novel that deals with themes such a death.

name: Miyamori
description: Miyamori is an action-adventure platformer set in a small town in northern Japan. It draws its inspiration from games like Okami, Majora's Mask, and Yoshi's Island, as well as folktales from the Tohoku region of Japan and the works of Miyazawa Kenji. It is being developed for PC, and will likely release on Mac as well.

name: Keeper and The Soldier
description:
A 2.5D stealth puzzle platformer from Jumpbutton Studio about a young girl who stumbles across something beautiful in a world ravaged by never-ending war. Keeper and the Soldier has elements of role playing and point-n-click adventure games with an emphasis on narrative, atmosphere and stealth.

The game is set in and around a dystopian city that lies on the border of a lush forest which protects a long forgotten secret. An ongoing war at the forefront of society has twisted the citizens of the city, mentally and physically. People here are born to serve in a disheartening, gloomy existence. Like ants, it is simply their way of life to either be a worker or a soldier.

The player controls EMI23 (or Emi for short), a young girl who is destined to be a soldier. She bonds with a curious creature called the Keeper in the outer forest who needs her help. Emi must recover pieces of an ancient device to save the archives of human history before the Keeper's exhausted life comes to an end.

Time will tell if her actions bring the dawn of a new era or reveal the most dangerous thing of all, the truth.

KEY FEATURES
-Explore a rich and beautiful immersive world with a forgotten past and collect clues to its origins.

-Stealth through guarded areas and outwit your foes while wielding powerful abilities and using the environment to your advantage.

-Experience a touching tale of companionship told through two characters with no one left to turn to but each other.

Keeper and the Soldier has elements of role playing and point-n-click adventure games with an emphasis on narrative, atmosphere and stealth.

name: Sentree
description: Ever wondered which of your friends could protect you with their eyes closed? Find out in Sentree - a cooperative, physical mobile game for 2 or more players about keeping a cool head and helping each other survive through the night in a dark, unfriendly forest. In Sentree, the Hero protects the tiny Antlers with her bulky flashlight that shoots light beams, which scares increasingly aggressive monsters back into hiding. However, the Hero (or shooter) is unable to see these monstrous apparitions, and must rely on the Antlers to point her in the right direction. The Antlers (or spotters), can see everything, but cannot defend themselves. In the real world, this means that the player with the role of the shooter is holding a smartphone and can fire, reload and aim, while the spotter or spotters are looking at a tablet device with a depiction of the game world. Sentree hinges entirely on communication between players. Mastering Sentree will require you to build or draw on trust relationships, and at the same time offers an engaging way to entertain people at a party.

name: Ghost Theory
description:
Ghost Theory is currently on Kickstarter.
It is set to be a single player first-person horror game developed for Virtual Reality headsets but playable without them.

In Ghost Theory you are a paranormal investigator and must investigate haunted places based on real locations and discover the truth behind them. The locations include castles, churches, asylums, and graveyards. The locations will be open-ended so you get to choose your path through each area. But there are risks to exploring to much.

The game will focus on stealth and exploration. Instead of getting directly attacked, ghosts will stalk and harass you as you investigate locations. You will have to find ways to avoid or trap them while managing your stress as they attempt to scare you to death. You will have upgradable tools and abilities to use as you progress in the game to help you search and survive.

name: Super Ultra Kogal
description:
Super Ultra Kogal tells the story of Sadako, a Japanese schoolgirl, karate expert & junk food enthusiast. After getting beating up and robbed after school by a Yakuza affiliated gang of Kogals, she goes into a rampage thru Tokyo's most famous districts while hunting down each of her attackers. 
 
Inspired by classic fighting puzzle games, as a player of Super Ultra Kogal, you will be able to fight your way thru iconic Tokyo's districts like Akihabara & Shibuya while facing archetypal enemies, including perverted Salarymen, Mecha Otakus and Gothic Lolitas.

name: Server Tycoon
description: Server Tycoon is a strategic and management (MMORTS) video game where players strive earning game coins offering internet services to their customers. The simulated companies can be listed on a Stock Exchange and players can buy shares from allies or opponents receiving profits, but remember pirates and competitors will try to stop you with frequent cyber attacks so, improve your infrastructure, organise your defences and try to climb the top of the hi-tech finance!

name: Fathom
description:
FATHOM is a fast paced action-strategy submarine combat game for the PC, where you’ll need quick reflexes, clever piloting skills, and tactical leadership to survive. Bringing a unique mixture of First-Person-Shooter (FPS) and Real-Time-Strategy (RTS) genres, FATHOM is a multi-player focused game that offers a variety of modes that support competitive (1v1 and team) play, as well as cooperative play.

Take control of a Deep Submergence Vehicle (DSV) and prepare for battle. Use beacons to call down structures from the sea surface and layout your base of operations to begin your campaign. Construct warships and command your fleet into the heart of your enemy’s base! Set up blockades of deployable turrets and mines to defend strategic locations from your enemies. Call to the sea surface for depth charge bombardments from above or bring huge capital ships to bear in an all-out epic war beneath the waves!

name: Classroom Aquatic
description: Classroom Aquatic is the world's first trivia/stealth game for the Oculus Rift. Players play as an exchange student in a school of dolphins, taking a test that the player is in no way prepared for. They must resort to cheating in order to pass it!

name: Commandos 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Luckless Seven
description:
Luckless Seven is the story of Mark Vesco’s coming of age. Once an inspired youngster, Mark finds himself living a listless, dutiful existence just two years out of high school. When a group of old friends contacts Mark about reuniting with them, the stars align to allow him to join his old friends in a nationwide competitive tournament. 
 
Take control of Mark as he and six friends set out to compete in Arithia’s most popular game, Ekosi. This fast and fun card game is inspired by KOTOR’s Pazaak, and the stakes couldn’t be higher. With a little experience, money, and luck, take Mark from a modest amateur to an Ekosi champion! 
 
Which card to play won’t be the only difficult choice for Mark, though. Along his journey, Mark will have to make several decisions that will challenge him morally, ethically, and socially. More than just a card game, Luckless Seven invites you to take control of the whole person. Who will Mark be on his quest for glory?

name: Before
description: Guide your tribe through the challenges of a harsh and unforgiving pre-historic world, shaping their culture and defining their history.

name: A.N.N.E.
description:
A.N.N.E is an exciting game blending platforming and a shoot’em up gameplay with a touch of RPG elements. A.N.N.E's style is inspired by 8-bit and 16-bit era games; an anthology in pixels that will take you back to the early days of video games using current technologies running in glorious 720p and with a dash of physics gameplay.

Imagine yourself a little robot named Number25, who has been accused of being in love with A.N.N.E – another robot. Love amongst robots is forbidden and punishable by banishment and disassembly. You have to find A.N.N.E who was scattered on planet Gomi. There you will travel on foot or on board your ship to explore mysterious places, solve puzzles, collect crystals to upgrade or buy new equipment and face enemies in order to retrieve and reassemble A.N.N.E.

name: Soul Saga: Episode 1
description:
Soul Saga is a traditional role-playing video game in the vein of the Final Fantasy, Suikoden, Breath of Fire, and Persona video game series. Battles are initiated similarly to Chrono Trigger, where combat begins upon the player directing the character into an enemy in the world map. Once initiated, combat consists of a turn based battle system similar to Final Fantasy X. The game will also have airship battles, similar to Skies of Arcadia.

Exploration of the overworld map will also be a major aspect of gameplay, with the player being able to explore on foot similarly to Final Fantasy VII, and by airship similarly to Skies of Arcadia.

name: BattleCry
description:
Battlecry amplifies team-based combat by combining visceral brutality and competitive multiplayer action to create a new gameplay experience. Choose your warrior - each with a meaningfully distinct suite of attacks and abilities - from one of several factions from diverse parts of the world. With strategy, brutal attacks, and unique weapons, fight for power and glory in 32-player battles across the WarZones. This is the life of a warrior, and victory is yours for the taking.

Following a cataclysmic world war at the dawn of the 20th century, the most powerful Empires left standing came together to ban gun powder under The Black Powder Treaty. The short peace that followed gave birth to the Pansophic Revolution – a golden age of industrial manufacturing and design. As technology advanced, old tensions reignited and soon the world faced the scourge of war once more. Fueled by technological Pansophic advancements, the face of warfare has changed. All disagreements are settled head-on by elite teams of chosen warriors from all over the world, with each member specializing in either high-tech ranged gadgetry or sophisticated melee weapons. Trained and bred for battle, they meet each other in sanctioned WarZones to face off for their share of glory.

name: Project Phoenix
description: Project Phoenix is a Japanese RPG combined with a squad-based Real Time Strategy game created by a team of talented Eastern and Western developers and artists who have worked on many blockbuster videogame titles. The team we have brought together has allowed us to fuse together Japanese artistic aesthetics and Western design functionality. As a result, we are better able to draw inspiration from the best of both worlds, bringing a richer, more immersive gameplay experience worthy of JRPG fans like you!

name: Tobari Dream Ocean: Nightmare
description:
Dive into a nightmarish addition with ' Tobari Dream Ocean' – now featuring nightmarish versions of all stages!

After purchase, you'll have the option to switch to the Nightmare version from the title screen. The story remains fundamentally unchanged from the main storyline.

Nightmare! This is a game that CANNOT be recommended to any normal gamer.
For those who have conquered all of Tobari Dream Ocean's main stages and crave even greater challenges, this content is tailored for the true daredevils!

name: The Shaft
description: Sgt. Reed has been tasked with descending into an abandoned underground facility, activating the power generator and opening the main entrance. But things did not exactly work as planned, leaving Reed stranded underground with no means of communication, most of the gear lost and very little idea of what went wrong in the first place and, most importantly, what lies at the bottom of the shaft...

name: Judgement
description: let's play tarot

name: Meor
description:
Your mission is to explore the world from the highest mountain to the deepest dungeon. Encounter dangerous foes and meet friendly souls. Loot hidden treasure chests and items from legendary creatures. Gather resources to build a shack, a mansion or even a castle. Craft your own weapons and tools to prepare for an unforgettable and epic adventure. 
 
Meor is a fantasy-themed sandbox game in early development. The engine of the game is developed with custom voxel GPU technology. The world is one big grid and each element in the grid is called a voxel. Voxels have many different properties like material, density and sun light. 
 
The game runs almost exclusively on your graphics card. This allows all the voxels near you to be controlled at the same time! The physics, the AI and all other simulations run on the graphics card as well, enabling many objects to interact with you and each other. 
 
https://twitter.com/nelstuff is where you can find the latest development updates!

name: Paleo: Rising Town
description: Paleo is an exciting new puzzle game! Unite cells and develop your civilization.

name: Forest's Secret
description: A traveler in search of treasure finds the quaint village of Wabika.

name: The House of God
description: A sequel to The Tower. It is also about trans women, tarot, and therapy; but also about self-loathing, time loops, and obsession.

name: Rockmen R2: Dr. W*ly no Saiki!!
description: A Touhou Doujin game based on Rockman (Megaman), developed by Capricorn.

name: Tobari 2: Dream Ocean
description: Tobari is back in the latest action platformer from indie developer, Desunoya. Use that staff and smack around your enemies for their magic as you traverse the Dream Ocean. Seek out the mysterious voice that calls to you from beyond the sea as you journey with Tobari into this unknown new world.

name: Served
description: Served is a fast paced game about throwing oranges into plates and dunking meat to make the greatest of dishes.

name: World to Build
description: World to Build is a voxel based sandbox game where you can use voxels and blocks to make your own avatars, hats, pets, and entire worlds.

name: The Last Letter
description: The Last Letter is a VR Narrative Puzzle Game. An enigmatic letter of girlfriend's Grandma accompanying an antique board game will lead you to the discovery of a mysterious and fantastic world.

name: 傲皇忆剑诀
description: In the continents of disputes among nations, countries have organized competitions. You can recruit all kinds of martial arts to help you win the competitions in the future. You can also establish relationships with these generals, such as husband and wife, brothers and so on. The abilities and attributes of these generals are random.

developers.name: 流一心娱乐游戏集团总部

name: Mad Hunting Simulator VR
description: Enjoy the pleasure and courage of VR hunting in an indescribably realistic and beautiful open world created to be reunited with nature while hunting. Go hunting and pre-entertain yourself in the detailed territory of the hunting house, full details of the objects around you!

name: Christmas Wonderland
description: Help Santa and the elves to put the festive season back on track in this colorful and charming Christmas cracker of a hidden object game.

name: Hiking Simulator 2018
description: Put on your hiking boots and get ready to explore a gigantic winter landscape!

name: Dayshift at Freddy's 3
description: Dayshift at Freddy's 3 is the third and final game in the series.

name: Lovelydoll/Wildmachine
description:
Nordic, a natural born genius, had spent 10 years toiling away making a "mechanical doll", as a way to atone for something in his past. One day the doll gains sentience once a wandering soul resides inside it, and so begins the protagonist’s journey of experiencing what it means to live by interacting with the residents of Wingil, doing errands, battling and mini-games.
There is 1 main story and 3 unique epilogues.

name: Warm
description:
Megumi Shimizu's life is routine and monotonous. Get up, go to school early, fulfill her duties as class leader, try to deal with Inoue, and go home and do it all again tomorrow. She has no friends, her life doesn't seem like it'll go anywhere...and she's fine with that.

She's used to it, just like she's used to the cold, numbing winters in her hometown of Ikigai.

Then one day, a new transfer arrives. A new transfer who is instantly liked by her classmates and teacher, who is everything Megumi is not. Bubbly, sweet, happy, social.
And for some reason, this new girl, Hinata Mikami, thinks Megumi is nice and wants to be friends. And Megumi is stunned to find she likes Hinata too...

Little by little, Megumi's cold and unfeeling world sounds less and less appealing.

name: Age of Solitaire
description: Build up a magical kingdom by playing solitaire! Accrue gold, gather relics, and fight off monsters all by playing through different arrangements of solitaire with detailed backgrounds and helpful items.

name: A Christmas Peril
description: A Christmas Peril is a holiday action game with 100% of proceeds going to charity. Players are engaged in a snowball fight through colorful and snowy arenas, frantically tossing snowballs at anything that moves. Jump, duck, hide and try to land that perfect shot to cover your opponent in snow.

name: Chi Busters
description: Explore the rivalries and unique dynamics of conflict in a gaming studio. Take the place of game designers, producers, writers, and more! These Chibified people unleash their ultimate abilities to reach the top of this studio.

name: RTS Commander: Smash the Rebels
description: Welcome to Earth Republic army! The year is 2257. Fight against Rebels, explore territories, build a new bases, develop new vehicles, discover what lies ahead and restore peace. The hope lies on your shoulders..

name: Lucky Dog 1 + Bad Egg
description: Lucky Dog 1 + Bad Egg is both an "alternate reality" focusing on Gian x Bakshii and a fandisc of the original Luckydog1. The main game of Bad Egg focuses on Gian x Bakshii, whilst players can also read the after stories of Bernardo, Giulio, Ivan and Luchino that are set after their respective good endings from the first game.

name: Amaze Valentine
description: Amaze Valentine is a straightforward and surprisingly - difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with romantic art and calm soundtrack.

name: Doorways
description: Rescue your kitten from an alien force by travelling through portals masked as green doorways. What lies ahead for our hero? Probably not much good, although that might be up to you.

name: Dragon Ball: Strongest Warrior
description:
Dragon Ball: Strongest Warrior is an Action-Adventure, RPG, Single-player, and Multiplayer video game developed by Tencent Games. Throughout the game, the player has to follow the protagonist’s story, who has to smash out the enemies being arrived on Earth. Moreover, the player can also participate in Dragon World events, including the Z saga.

The player can move his character using simple controls such as a virtual pad and perform special attacks. 3D visuals let the player move the camera around and zoom inside the action. As the player continues, he can unlock new characters with unique abilities. Popular characters such as Chichi, Krillin, or Yamcha are there, whereas enemies such as Piccolo or Vegeta will give the player a tough time.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3: V Generation - Let's Get Nepucated
description: Let's Get Nepucated DLC unlocks a special event called Nepucation

name: Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror - The Little Devil
description: Experience Putri’s journey to get the inheritance in her grandfather’s old Javanese Dutch-colonial mansion while revealing what has happened to her mother’s family in the past.

name: Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror - The Hungry Witch
description: Follow the journey of Kirana to save her unborn baby and defeat the evil power before it gains the power to ruin the world while surrounded by life-threatening events in the middle of the mythical Bali settings.

name: Alone in the Grey
description: Alone in the Grey is an adventure puzzle game where the player must escape from a UFO they have mysteriously awoke in. Uncover clues and solve puzzles to escape and find out the reason for your capture. Hack terminals and find batteries to obtain freedom.

name: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
description: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch is an interactive movie in the Black Mirror series, produced by Netflix. The movie has a playable interface with which the player choose some of the character's actions and end up with different endings based on your choices. The plot talks about a young man trying to be a game developer in the ZX Spectrum era, while gets around the inner functioning of the scene and tries to survive the choices the player makes.

name: Ritualistic Madness
description: A horror maze in the style of a Virtual Boy game.

name: DoraKone
description: Follow along with the adventures of Dulce as she finds new friends, new fun, and maybe even romance in the world of Dragon Connection, a hot new augmented reality mobile game. A, short and sweet free all-ages GxG visual novel featuring cute girls, friendship, and romance!

name: Finding summer
description: Finding summer - a three-dimensional platformer about a kid named Aki, whose nostalgia for the past summer forced him to go on an unforgettable adventure - in search of summer! On the way to his goal, he will meet not only many dangers, but also make new friends.

name: Vip Em Up - The action movies stars beat em up Ep.0 ( beta )
description: Fight playing famous action movie stars!

name: Offendron Warrior
description:
Offendron Warrior is a retro arcade that combines shooting and defense, inspired by Williams Electronics' 1981 classic 'Defender'.

Your objective is saving Offendron civilians in the planets from the group of enemies, who are trying to spread a virus that turns Offendrons into mindless killing machines and eventually destroy the whole planet.

name: Werewolf Hunter X
description: Werewolf Hunter X is a retro style 2d crafting and survival sandbox game that is currently in development by SeaCreatureSandwich, and boasts unique item building, procedural generation, rogue-like resource scarcity, mythical monsters, static and procedural world design, and much more.

name: SpaceWorms
description: SpaceWorms is a turn-based strategy game which puts you in the role of "Ze Wormperor", overlord over a galactic civilization. Develop your planets and steal, bomb, infect, colonize, brainwash, and conquer your way to total domination in this wiggly, crazy, and politically incorrect multi-gravity artillery game.

name: Mobile Wars X
description: Mobile Wars X is a shoot them up in which you must fight against an alien invasion. You can choose between 3 Mobile X: A very fast ship capable of firing tracking missiles, A robot with advanced ninja weapons and a special ship with unique laser attacks!

name: Damnaze
description: You were taken into this damn maze, but you are not the first, and you are not the last.Here you do not have friends.You have only hope for salvation. To escape from this place you can use absolutely everything that you have found.

name: Blaster Lilo
description: Blast through an endless horde of enemies in this survival shoot'em up or compete against other players in a battle for the ultimate score.

name: Knights of the Card Table
description: Master over 100 dungeons and 3 worlds in this dungeon crawler card game that puts YOU in control of the dungeon cards. Rearrange the dungeon cards to collect loot before rolling dice to slay foes with your nunchucks.

name: War of Three Kingdoms
description: This is a strategy type game, players can capture the city, the final one continent, in this process, players can collect hundreds of heroes, different heroes have different skills and abilities, you can also train the hero, build a strong army.

name: Frantic Dimension
description: Frantic Dimension is a retro twin-stick shooter inspired by the earliest twin-sticks, 'Space Dungeon' and 'Robotron 2084'. Never stop moving and shooting... or you'll die.

name: Rolling Bird
description: Rolling Bird is a retro arcade shooter, heavily inspired by Namco's 1986 classic 'Rolling Thunder'.

name: Steel Alcimus
description: Steel Alcimus is a top-down helicopter shooter. Complete various tasks with your ally aircraft; such as saving the carrier, taking down the buildings, carrying objects, etc.

name: Winter's Symphonies
description: After shutting the door to a life many would envy, the protagonist of the story, Sophie, returns to her one and only hometown. The town is just as she remembers it. She, however, is not. She can't help seeing herself as empty - as empty as the barren trees around her.

name: Rogue Fable III
description: Rogue Fable III is a traditional rogue-like game which combines the depth, complexity, and challenge of the genre classics with a shorter, more tightly focused game length.

name: Super Grower
description: Super Grower is a fun game of agility and reflexes. In this game you must control a white square and grow the square to an immense size to eliminate all other objects on the level. By moving the square around the playing area and eat the smaller yellow tokens your square will grow big.

name: OO.Inc
description: OO.Inc is a indie 3-Match-puz game. You are a newbie employee. Complete tasks and unlock new levels. Put material chains on the board.make a line of 3 same color to score.dots can be stacked on circles.

name: Touhou KSG Story
description: This game is a fan game of Touhou fan movie. The setting etc differs from what is called Touhou series of Shanghai Alice. It is an omnibus by several genres such as action, shooting, puzzle, sports.

name: Laser Party
description: Laser Party is an online/local friendship-ruining party game With a unique laser combining system.

name: Chinese Driving License Test
description: Want to take a driving test? Or are you ready to take the driving test? Then come and buy a driving test simulator. All questions are 2018 latest question bank, of course, we will update at any time to ensure that the question bank is complete.

name: Enchanted Path
description: Enchanted Path is a fun and unique puzzle game in which you must control a man who is traveling through a series of enchanted portals! Watch out as the tiles can fall away beneath your feet so you must move quickly and not make any wrong moves!

name: They That Feast
description: They That Feast is a cosmic / Lovecraftian horror game in which your enemies can't simply be observed by the naked eye. Can you walk the line between sanity and survival?

name: Snowballed: Crazy Downhill
description: Welcome to the snow adventure Snowballed: Crazy Downhill! Control a small snowball, which merrily rolls down the slope, and don't let it face big obstacles!

name: Wisentree Spirit
description: In this virtual reality tower defence, you will embody a hero, push back the enemies assaults, By building a network of defensive Towers and manipulating, internal might that will grant you powers of the mystical Fire.

name: Fallen Threats
description: Explore a random dungeon generated, pick up loot, level up, fight enemies and bosses, buy new swords, go deeper and use your abilities. How long will you survive?

name: Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror
